TITLE: Episode 117 - Dead Men's Tales with Dr. Rebecca Simon
DESCRIPTION: This week, we are joined by Dr. Rebecca Simon, a historian and expert in all things pirates from all time periods and geographic locations. An author and TikToker who shares her expertise and passion for scalawags the world over. Join us as we discuss piracy, its history, and how it affected American culture.
